src:
Seharusnya Malam Jumat, Mengapa Arsenal Main di Harinya Liga Champions?
05 Nov 2019, 10:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal kembali beraksi di Liga Europa pekan ini, tapi ada satu perbedaan unik. Alih-alih berlaga di malam jumat seperti biasanya, Arsenal justru 'numpang' di jadwalnya Liga Champions.
Ya, The Gunners bakal melawat ke Portugal untuk menghadapi Vitoria Guimaraes. Mereka menang tipis 3-2 atas rival Grup H itu pada duel pertama dua pekan lalu di Emirates Stadium.
Duel ini bakal dipertandingkan pada Rabu (6/11/2019) malam WIB, lebih cepat dari jadwal seharusnya. Keputusan ini tentu mengundang tanya, terlebih karena Arsenal merupakan salah satu tim kuat di ajang tersebut.
Apa yang melandasi keputusan tersebut? Mengapa UEFA menggusur jadwal Asenal? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneteres!
text:
Should have been Friday night, why did Arsenal play in the Champions League today?
05 Nov 2019, 10:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal are back in action in the Europa League this week, but there is one unique difference. Instead of competing on Friday nights as usual, Arsenal actually 'hitchhike' in the Champions League schedule.
Yes, the Gunners will travel to Portugal to face Vitoria Guimaraes. They narrowly won 3-2 over Group H rivals in the first duel two weeks ago at the Emirates Stadium.
This duel will be contested on Wednesday (11/06/2019) night WIB, ahead of schedule. This decision certainly invited questions, especially since Arsenal were one of the strongest teams in the event.
What underlies the decision? Why does UEFA displace Asenal's schedule? Read below, yes, Bolaneteres!
